reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 104/20: EMERGENCY ORDER UNDER SUBSECTION 7.0.2 (4) OF THE ACT - CLOSURE OF OUTDOOR RECREATIONAL AMENITIES
reg_info.reg_name_text: EMERGENCY ORDER UNDER SUBSECTION 7.0.2 (4) OF THE ACT - CLOSURE OF OUTDOOR RECREATIONAL AMENITIES
reg_info.act_under: Emergency Management and Civil Protection Act

content.content: 1. In this Schedule, “outdoor sports amenities” means outdoor sports facilities and multi-use fields, including baseball diamonds, soccer fields, frisbee golf locations, tennis, platform tennis, table tennis and pickleball courts, basketball courts, BMX parks and skate parks.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Schedule,

“outdoor sports amenities” means outdoor sports facilities and multi-use fields, including baseball diamonds, soccer fields, frisbee golf locations, tennis, platform tennis, table tennis and pickleball courts, basketball courts, BMX parks and skate parks.

content.content: 2. Until the end of June 11, 2020, this Schedule applies to the following facilities that are intended for use by more than one household, regardless of whether they are publicly or privately owned and regardless of whether they are attached to a park system: 1. All outdoor playgrounds, play structures and equipment. 2. All outdoor pools, whirlpools and spas, splash pads, spray pads, wading pools and water slides. 3. All communal facilities intended to be used by persons using outdoor sports amenities, with the exception of those listed in Schedule 2 to O. Reg. 82/20 (Order Under Subsection 7.0.2 (4) of the Act — Stage 1 Closures). 4. All portions of park and recreational areas containing outdoor fitness equipment.
content.raw_html:
2. Until the end of June 11, 2020, this Schedule applies to the following facilities that are intended for use by more than one household, regardless of whether they are publicly or privately owned and regardless of whether they are attached to a park system:

1. All outdoor playgrounds, play structures and equipment.

2. All outdoor pools, whirlpools and spas, splash pads, spray pads, wading pools and water slides.

3. All communal facilities intended to be used by persons using outdoor sports amenities, with the exception of those listed in Schedule 2 to O. Reg. 82/20 (Order Under Subsection 7.0.2 (4) of the Act — Stage 1 Closures).

4. All portions of park and recreational areas containing outdoor fitness equipment.

content.content: 3. Beginning on June 12, 2020, this Schedule applies to the facilities referred to in sections 3.1 and 3.2, regardless of whether they are publicly or privately owned and regardless of whether they are attached to a park system.
content.raw_html: 3. Beginning on June 12, 2020, this Schedule applies to the facilities referred to in sections 3.1 and 3.2, regardless of whether they are publicly or privately owned and regardless of whether they are attached to a park system.

Reg. 82/20 (Order Under Subsection 7.0.2 (4) of the Act — Stage 1 Closures). 4. All portions of park and recreational areas containing outdoor fitness equipment.
content.raw_html:
3.1 In the health units to which O. Reg. 82/20 (Order Under Subsection 7.0.2 (4) of the Act — Stage 1 Closures) applies, this Schedule applies to the following facilities that are intended for use by more than one household:

1. All outdoor playgrounds, play structures and equipment.

2. All outdoor pools, whirlpools and spas, splash pads, spray pads, wading pools and water slides.

3. All communal facilities intended to be used by persons using outdoor sports amenities, with the exception of those listed in Schedule 2 to O. Reg. 82/20 (Order Under Subsection 7.0.2 (4) of the Act — Stage 1 Closures).

4. All portions of park and recreational areas containing outdoor fitness equipment.

content.content: 3.2 In the health units to which O. Reg. 263/20 (Order Under Subsection 7.0.2 (4) of the Act — Stage 2 Closures) applies, this Schedule applies to the following facilities that are intended for use by more than one household: 1. All outdoor playgrounds, play structures and equipment. 2. All outdoor whirlpools and spas, as well as outdoor water slides. 3. All communal facilities intended to be used by persons using outdoor sports amenities, with the exception of those that may open under Schedule 2 to O. Reg. 263/20 (Order Under Subsection 7.0.2 (4) of the Act — Stage 2 Closures). 4. All portions of park and recreational areas containing outdoor fitness equipment.
content.raw_html:
3.2 In the health units to which O. Reg. 263/20 (Order Under Subsection 7.0.2 (4) of the Act — Stage 2 Closures) applies, this Schedule applies to the following facilities that are intended for use by more than one household:

1. All outdoor playgrounds, play structures and equipment.

2. All outdoor whirlpools and spas, as well as outdoor water slides.

3. All communal facilities intended to be used by persons using outdoor sports amenities, with the exception of those that may open under Schedule 2 to O. Reg. 263/20 (Order Under Subsection 7.0.2 (4) of the Act — Stage 2 Closures).

4. All portions of park and recreational areas containing outdoor fitness equipment.

content.content: 4. (1) Facilities to which this Schedule applies must be closed.  (2) No person shall enter or use a facility to which this Schedule applies except for maintenance, safety, law enforcement or other similar purpose. (3) For greater certainty, nothing in this Order precludes individuals from walking through or using portions of park and recreational areas that are not otherwise closed and that do not contain a facility to which this Schedule applies, other than a communal facility that is intended to be used by persons using outdoor sports amenities and to which this Schedule applies.
content.raw_html:
4. (1) Facilities to which this Schedule applies must be closed.

(2) No person shall enter or use a facility to which this Schedule applies except for maintenance, safety, law enforcement or other similar purpose.

(3) For greater certainty, nothing in this Order precludes individuals from walking through or using portions of park and recreational areas that are not otherwise closed and that do not contain a facility to which this Schedule applies, other than a communal facility that is intended to be used by persons using outdoor sports amenities and to which this Schedule applies.

content.content: 5. (1) Any person who uses allotment gardens or community gardens shall do so in compliance with the advice, recommendations and instructions of public health officials, including any advice, recommendations or instructions on physical distancing, cleaning or disinfecting. (2) Any person who uses any of the following facilities shall ensure that they maintain a physical distance of at least two metres from any other person who is also using the facility: 1. Outdoor sports amenities. 2. Off-leash dog areas. 3. Picnic sites, benches or shelters in parks or recreational areas. (3) Revoked: O. Reg. 265/20, s. 4 (2). O. Reg. 224/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 265/20, s. 2-4.  Français
content.raw_html:
5. (1) Any person who uses allotment gardens or community gardens shall do so in compliance with the advice, recommendations and instructions of public health officials, including any advice, recommendations or instructions on physical distancing, cleaning or disinfecting.

(2) Any person who uses any of the following facilities shall ensure that they maintain a physical distance of at least two metres from any other person who is also using the facility:

1. Outdoor sports amenities.

2. Off-leash dog areas.

3. Picnic sites, benches or shelters in parks or recreational areas.

(3) Revoked: O. Reg. 265/20, s. 4 (2).

O. Reg. 224/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 265/20, s. 2-4.
